name: Caiden: The Search Of The Dino Nuggets
name_original: Caiden: The Search Of The Dino Nuggets
description:
"Caiden: The Search Of The Dino Nuggets" is a thrilling platformer game. You play as a daring hero on a mission to eradicate the evil chicken nuggets that have taken over the land. Your goal is to jump, run, and dodge through various levels filled with dangerous obstacles and enemies.

In addition to defeating the chicken nuggets, you also have the opportunity to collect precious Dino Nuggets. These rare and valuable collectibles give you access to the next level, allowing you to take on even more demanding challenges and enemies.

With its colorful graphics, exciting gameplay, and a hilarious storyline, "Caiden: The Search Of The Dino Nuggets" will keep you entertained.
